main.description: A toolkit for assisting in the editing of content files for Survivalcraft game, including database (.xdb), clothes (.clo) and widgets (or screens, dialogs)
commands.insertRandomGuid.title: Insert a random GUID
commands.addToPreDatabaseFiles.title: Add this file to SCT preposed databases
commands.removeFromPreDatabaseFiles.titl: Remove this file from SCT preposed databases
commands.addToPreLanguageFiles.title: Add this file to SCT preposed language jsons
commands.removeFromPreLanguageFiles.titl: Remove this file from SCT preposed language jsons
configurations.preposedLanguageFiles.des:
### Preposed Language Files

This extension will preload the strings from the following language files in order.

For example, if you add the full `en-US.json` to this list, when you hover the cursor on `"[MainMenuScreen:2]"`, you will see `Play (English)`.

You can right click on a json file to add it to this list.
configurations.defaultDatabaseXsdPath.de:
### Default Database.xsd path

When the XSD is not set at the root element, you can set it in the Quick Fix.
configurations.preposedDatabaseFiles.des:
### Preposed Database Files

This extension will preload the GUIDs from the following database files in order.

You can right click on a xml or xdb file to add it to this list.
configurations.defaultClothesXsdPath.des:
### Default Clothes.xsd path

When the XSD is not set at the root element, you can set it in the Quick Fix.
configurations.defaultCraftingRecipesXsd:
### Default CraftingRecipes.xsd path

When the XSD is not set at the root element, you can set it in the Quick Fix.
